name: The legendary Tri-Blade known as 'Heartseeker' (1h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (nice in general).
It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It does magical damage a bit.
This weapon will increase the users constitution
This weapon will increase the ability to hit
This weapon does more damage than usual
This weapon will increase the users power.
